typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductId as string,
		ProductName as string,
		ProductShortDescription as string,
		ProductDescription as string,
		IntroductionDate as timestamp,
		ServingSizeId as integer,
		ServingSizeDescription as string,
		GlobalTradeItemNumber as decimal(18,2),
		EuropeanArticleNumber as decimal(18,2),
		UniversalProductCode as decimal(18,2),
		ProductVolume as decimal(18,2),
		ProductVolumeUomId as string,
		ProductNetWeight as decimal(18,2),
		ProductNetWeightUomId as string,
		ProductGrossWeight as decimal(18,2),
		ProductGrossWeightUomId as string,
		ItemSku as string,
		PrimaryBrandId as string,
		ProductTypeId as string,
		LastModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	entity: 'Product.cdm.json/Product',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'default',
	entityPath: 'product',
	corpusPath: 'CorpusGIT',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'deltatest',
	folderPath: 'ProductDelta',
	fileSystem: 'deltatest3') ~> ProductDelta
ProductDelta sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DWNewRecords
